comments:
When two datasets were joined in a Joint DataSet and one of them don t have any rows (query returns 0 rows) a Null Pointer Exception is thrown.


See Stack Trace below

In Birt 2.1.1 the class BinaryTreeResultObjectSeeker is not used anymore and the bug disappear. Please use Birt 2.1.1 or later version.
